Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to green building standards and repealing section 224.1 of the New York city charter in relation thereto

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.9802/S.8783, in relation to establishing a program to address the legalization of specified accessory dwelling units in a city with a population of one million or more.

Items.MatterName: Establishing a program to address the legalization of specified accessory dwelling units in a city with a population of one million or more. (A.9802/S.8783)
